mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ChatRooms (chatRoomId, chatRoomName, createdUserId) VALUES (ChatRooms_seq.nextval, #{chatRoomName}, #{createdUserId})
INSERT INTO Messages (messageId, chatRoomId, senderId, messageText, messageType) VALUES (Messages_seq.nextval, #{chatRoomId}, #{senderId}, #{messageText}, #{messageType})
mapper.select: SELECT count(distinct userId) FROM ChatRoomMembers CM JOIN Messages Me ON Me.chatRoomId == CM.chatRoomId WHERE CM.chatRoomId == #{chatRoomId}
